remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 是無狀態的，但 不是。 are stateless, but the is not. 為了支援如更新管理等功能，會在互動之間維護用戶端上的狀態。State on the client is maintained between interactions in order to support features such as update management. 這個類別以及 類別 (後者表示對資料服務的特定 HTTP 要求) 是用戶端程式庫中兩個主要類別。This class, and the class that represents a particular HTTP request to a data service, are the two main classes in the client library. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用「加入服務參考」工具所產生的 ，以隱含方式對 Northwind 資料服務執行查詢，傳回所有客戶。The following example shows how to use the generated by the Add Service Reference tool to implicitly execute a query against the Northwind data service that returns all customers. 內容會自動判斷所要求之 `Customers` 實體集的 URI。The URI of the requested `Customers` entity set is determined automatically by the context. 發生列舉時會隱含執行查詢。The query is executed implicitly when the enumeration occurs. 當您完成時，會建立 Northwind 資料服務[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。The Northwind data service is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知 相關來源與目標物件之間有新連結，而且連結是以指定的來源屬性表示。Notifies the that a new link exists between the related source and target objects and that the link is represented by the specified source property. 會將這個連結加入新建立的連結集，而在對 的下一個呼叫時便會將該連結集傳送至資料服務。The adds this link to the set of newly created links that will be sent to the data service on the next call to . 連結是單向的關聯性。Links are one-way relationships. 因為關聯是雙向的在一對一的關聯中您必須呼叫以建立反向連結，並在多對一關聯，您必須呼叫建立關聯的 「 一 」 端的參考連結。Because associations are bi-directional, in a one-to-one association you must call either again to create the reverse link, and in a many-to-one association you must call to create a reference link to the "one" end of the association. 目標物件必須是 `sourceProperty` 參數所識別的型別，或是該型別的子型別。The target object must be of the type identified by the `sourceProperty` parameter or a subtype of the type. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 和 方法來建立定義關聯性的連結。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create links that define relationships. 此範例中也會明確設定 `Order_Details` 物件的導覽屬性。In this example, the navigation properties on the `Order_Details` object are also explicitly set. 這個範例會使用根據您完成時，會建立的 Northwind 資料服務加入服務參考 工具所產生[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的 物件用來確定非同步作業已完成的時間。The returned object is used to determine when the asynchronous operation has completed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 非同步作業](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Operations](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md). 這些查詢會指定為 執行個體。The queries are specified as instances. 這個方法會傳回表示整個批次要求之回應的 。Returns a that represents the response of the batch request as a whole. 個別查詢回應表示為 物件，可透過列舉 執行個體存取這些物件。Individual query responses are represented as objects that can be accessed by enumerating the instance. 當此方法傳回時，已從網路資料流讀取批次要求的完整 HTTP 回應，但尚未處理回應。When this method returns, all of the HTTP response for the batch request has been read from the network stream but the responses have not been processed. 除非回應中的指定之實體經過列舉，否則不會對該實體進行任何識別 (Identity) 解析或物件具體化。No identity resolution or object materialization occurs for a specified entity in the response until it is enumerated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會叫用擷取屬性值的網路作業。Calling this method invokes a network operation to retrieve the value of a property. 指定的屬性可能是實體上的任何一個屬性，包括代表關聯或連結的屬性。The property specified may be any one of the properties on an entity, including properties which represent associations or links. 如果屬性表示關聯或連結或是擱置的屬性，呼叫這個方法則會提供用戶端一個延遲載入資源的方式。If the property represents an association or link or a deferred property, calling this method provides the client with a way to lazily load related resources. 如果實體處於已修改狀態，屬性值會載入相關實體，並將這些實體和任何連結標記成未變更。If the entity is in the modified state, the property value loads related entities and marks them and any links as unchanged. 如果已載入該屬性，則呼叫此方法會讓您重新整理屬性的值。If the property is already loaded, calling this method lets you refresh the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更會以呼叫 、、、、、、 或 的方式加入至 。Changes are added to the by calling the , , , , , , , or . 變更會以如同 方法的方式傳送至資料服務：每一個 HTTP 要求進行一個變更作業。Changes are sent to the data service, as with the method, one change operation per HTTP request. 如果在處理作業時發生錯誤，資料服務不會處理任何其他作業，If an error occurs while processing an operation, no additional operations are processed by the data service. 而是產生回應，告知用戶端哪些作業已執行、結果，以及哪些作業由於錯誤而未嘗試。Instead, a response is generated telling the client what operations were executed, the results, and which operations were not tried because of an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更會以呼叫 、、、、、、 或 的方式加入至 。Changes are added to the by calling the , , , , , , , or . 如果設定 ，則所有暫止的變更都包含在批次中的單一變更集，並在單一 HTTP 要求中送出給資料服務。If is set, all pending changes are included in a single change set in a batch and submitted to the data service in a single HTTP request. 這項作業需要目標服務支援批次處理才行。This requires that the target service supports batching. 如果 未設定：If is not set: - 變更傳送到資料服務的方式就如同 方法一樣：每個 HTTP 要求一個作業。Changes are sent to the data service such as in the method: one operation to one HTTP request. - 一定會是 200。The is always 200. - 屬性會傳回空集合。The property returns an empty collection. 如果設定 ：If is set: - 如果在處理變更集作業時發生錯誤，資料服務不會嘗試變更集的後續作業，不過資料服務會繼續處理批次中的下一個變更集。If an error occurs processing an operation in a change set, the subsequent operations in the change set will not be tried; however, the data service will continue to process the next change set in the batch. - 已設定 時不能設定此選項，因為當啟用批次處理時，所有作業都放置在單一變更集。This option cannot be set when is set because when batching is enabled, all operations are positioned in a single change set. 如果 未設定：If is not set: - 如果在處理作業時發生錯誤，資料服務不會處理任何其他作業，If an error occurs while processing an operation, no additional operations are processed by the data service. 而是產生回應，告知用戶端哪些作業已執行、其結果，以及哪些作業由於錯誤而未嘗試。A response is generated telling the client which operations were executed, their results, and what operations were not tried because of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據標準的開始-結束非同步模式，在擷取查詢結果時會叫用所提供的回呼。According to the standard begin-end asynchronous pattern, the provided callback is invoked when query results are retrieved. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 非同步作業](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Operations](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/asynchronous-operations-wcf-data-services.md). 叫用回呼的時候，就會已經從 HTTP 資料流讀取所有結果，但是未加以處理，而且不會對任何本機使用者端的物件進行具體化或修改，也不會發生識別解析。When the callback is invoked, all results have been read from the HTTP stream, but they have not been processed; no local user-facing objects have been materialized or modified and identity resolution has not occurred. 叫用 的時候，就會建立並傳回 ，但是仍未處理結果。When is invoked, a is created and returned but the results still have not been processed. 只有當使用者列舉結果的時候，才會發生識別解析、物件具體化和管理。Identity resolution, object materialization, and manipulation occur only when the user enumerates the results. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何透過呼叫 方法啟動查詢來執行非同步查詢。The following example shows how to execute an asynchronous query by calling the method to start the query. 內嵌委派會呼叫 方法以顯示查詢結果。The inline delegate calls the method to display the query results. 這個範例會使用根據您完成時，會建立的 Northwind 資料服務加入服務參考 工具所產生[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用於依 URI 查詢資料服務；該方法會導致 HTTP GET 要求發出給資料服務。The method is used to query a data service by URI; the method causes an HTTP GET request to be issued to the data service. 指定的要求 URI 可以是絕對或相對 URI。The request URI specified can be absolute or relative. 如果 `requestUri` 是絕對 URI，這個方法會驗證 URI 是否指向建構 時所指定的相同資料服務。If the `requestUri` is absolute, this method validates whether the URI points to the same data service that was specified when constructing the . 如果 `requestUri` 是相對，此方法會移除任何前導斜線並將 `requestUri` 附加到建構 時提供的路徑。If the `requestUri` is relative, this method strips off any leading slashes and appends `requestUri` to what was provided when constructing the . 在傳遞至 建構函式的 URI 後面會附加斜線 (若沒有的話)。A slash is appended after the URI passed to the constructor, if one is not already present. 當此方法傳回時，已從網路資料流讀取要求的所有 HTTP 回應，但尚未處理回應；不會識別解析或將物件具體化。When this method returns, all of the HTTP response for the request has been read from the network stream, but the response will not have been processed; there is no identity resolution or object materialization. 除非回應中的指定之實體經過列舉，否則不會對該實體進行任何識別解析或完整物件具體化。Identity resolution and full object materialization do not occur for a specified entity in the response until it is enumerated. ## Examples 本範例使用 `do…while` 迴圈，從資料服務的分頁結果載入 `Customers` 實體。This example uses a `do…while` loop to load `Customers` entities from a paged results from the data service. 透過使用下一個連結 URI 呼叫 方法以接收下一頁資料。The method is called by using the next link URI to receive the next page of data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些查詢會指定為 執行個體。The queries are specified as instances. 這個方法會傳回表示整個批次要求之回應的 。Returns a that represents the response of the batch request as a whole. 個別查詢回應表示為個別 物件，可透過列舉 執行個體存取這些物件。Individual query responses are represented as individual objects that can be accessed by enumerating the instance. 當此方法傳回時，已從網路資料流讀取批次要求的完整 HTTP 回應，但尚未處理回應。When this method returns the whole HTTP response for the batch request has been read from the network stream, but the responses have not been processed. 除非回應中的指定之實體經過列舉，否則不會對該實體進行任何識別 (Identity) 解析或物件具體化。No identity resolution or object materialization occurs for a specified entity in the response until it is enumerated. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何呼叫 方法，執行 物件的陣列，其中包含從 Northwind 資料服務同時傳回 `Customers` 和 `Products` 物件的查詢。The following example shows how to call the method to execute an array of objects that contains queries that return both `Customers` and `Products` objects from the Northwind data service. 列舉傳回之 中的 物件集合，也會列舉包含在每一個 中的物件集合。The collection of objects in the returned is enumerated, and the collection of objects that is contained in each is also enumerated. 這個範例會使用根據您完成時，會建立的 Northwind 資料服務加入服務參考 工具所產生[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會叫用擷取屬性值的網路作業。Calling this method invokes a network operation to fetch the property value. 指定的屬性可能是實體上的任何一個屬性，包括代表關聯或連結的屬性。The property specified may be any one of the properties on the entity, including properties that represent associations or links. 如果屬性表示關聯或連結或是擱置的屬性，呼叫這個方法則會提供用戶端一個延遲載入資源的方式。If the property represents an association, link or deferred property, calling this method provides the client a way to lazily load related resources. 如果實體處於未變更或已修改狀態，屬性值會載入相關實體，並將這些具有未變更連結的實體標記成未變更。If the entity is in the unchanged or modified state, the property value loads the related entities and marks them unchanged with unchanged links 如果已載入該屬性，則呼叫此方法會讓您重新整理屬性的值。If the property is already loaded, calling this method lets you refresh the value of the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何明確地載入與所傳回之每個 `Customers` 執行個體相關的 `Orders` 物件。The following example shows how to explicitly load the `Customers` object that is related to each returned `Orders` instance. 這個範例會使用根據您完成時，會建立的 Northwind 資料服務加入服務參考 工具所產生[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]。This example uses the generated by the Add Service Reference tool based on the Northwind data service, which is created when you complete the [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] . remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用對用戶端程式庫使用之預設型別解析的覆寫。Enables override of the default type resolution used by the client library. 將此屬性設定為識別函式的委派，此函式用來將用戶端應用程式中的型別解析為命名空間限定的型別名稱。Set this property to a delegate that identifies a function that is used to resolve a type in the client application to a namespace-qualified type name. 這樣一來，用戶端就可以在伺服器回應所提供的型別名稱以及位於用戶端的型別之間，執行自訂對應。This enables the client to perform custom mapping between the type name provided in a response from the server and a type on the client. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會為指定的型別啟用已序列化為目標表示 (如 Atom 或 JSON) 之實體名稱的覆寫。This method enables override of the entity name that is serialized to the target representation, such as Atom or JSON, for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新連結是以 狀態建立。A new link is created in the state. 會將這個新連結加入至要在新建立的連結集，而在對 的下一個呼叫時便會將該連結集傳送至資料服務。The adds this new link to the set of newly created links to be sent to the data service on the next call to . 如果 target 引數為 null，則應該移除或刪除 sourceProperty 所表示的連結 (其狀態會進入 狀態)。If the target argument is null, the link represented by sourceProperty should be removed or deleted (The link is moved to the state). 連結是單向的關聯性。Links are one-way relationships. 如果返回指標存在指出雙向關聯，這個方法應該重新呼叫以通知的第二個連結If a back pointer exists indicating a two way association, this method should be called again to notify the of the second link 這個方法只支援將連結加入重數為 1 的關聯性 (來源屬性是物件參考)。This method only supports adding links to relationships with multiplicity = 1 (The source property is an object reference). 舉例來說，如果 `Person` 類別與另一個 `Person` 有 `Friend` 屬性的關係，這個呼叫可以用來使 `Person` 和 `Person` 產生關係。For example, if a class `Person` is related to another `Person` by a `Friend` property, this call could be used to relate `Person` to `Person`. 如果 `sourceProperty` 代表有多個基數的關聯性，此方法會擲回例外狀況。This method will throw an exception if the `sourceProperty` represented has a relationship of cardinality more than one. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 和 方法來建立定義關聯性的連結。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create links that define relationships. 此範例中也會明確設定 `Order_Details` 物件的導覽屬性。In this example, the navigation properties on the `Order_Details` object are also explicitly set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定為與相關聯之媒體資源的二進位資料流`entity`，此實體稱為媒體連結項目。The method sets the binary stream that is the Media Resource that is associated with the `entity`, which is called a Media Link Entry. 呼叫 方法會將實體標記為媒體連結項目。Calling the method marks the entity as a Media Link Entry. 實體狀態也設定為 ，因此下次呼叫 方法時會將資料流傳送到資料服務。The entity state is also set to so that the stream will be sent to the data service the next time that the method is called. 方法會讀取 直到結尾。The method reads the through to the end. 上不會嘗試 作業。A operation is not tried on the . 當`closeStream`是`true`，則方法傳回前，請關閉資料流。When `closeStream` is `true`, the method closes the stream before it returns. 即使發生錯誤而未讀取資料流，資料流也會關閉。The stream is closed even when an error occurs and the stream is not read. 當 `entity` 已套用 時，媒體資源不能是資料流。When the `entity` has the applied, the Media Resource cannot be a data stream. 先刪除此屬性，然後嘗試設定 `entity` 的資料流。Remove this attribute before you try to set the data stream for the `entity`. 不會對 `args` 中設定的標頭執行任何驗證。No validation is performed on the headers that are set in `args`. 因此，請不要使用變更要求意義的方式變更 HTTP 標頭。Therefore, do not change an HTTP header in a way that changes the meaning of the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定為與相關聯之媒體資源的二進位資料流`entity`，此實體稱為媒體連結項目。The method sets the binary stream that is the Media Resource that is associated with the `entity`, which is called a Media Link Entry. 呼叫 方法會將實體標記為媒體連結項目。Calling the method marks the entity as Media Link Entry. 實體狀態也設定為 ，因此下次呼叫 方法時會將資料流傳送到資料服務。The entity state is also set to so that the stream will be sent to the data service the next time that the method is called. 方法會讀取 直到結尾。The method reads the through to the end. 上不會嘗試 作業。A operation is not tried on the . 當`closeStream`是`true`，則方法傳回前，請關閉資料流。When `closeStream` is `true`, the method closes the stream before it returns. 即使發生錯誤而未讀取資料流，資料流也會關閉。The stream is closed even when an error occurs and the stream is not read. 當 `entity` 已套用 時，媒體資源不能是資料流。When the `entity` has the applied, the Media Resource cannot be a data stream. 先刪除此屬性，然後嘗試設定 `entity` 的資料流。Remove this attribute before you try to set the data stream for the `entity`. 不會對 `contentType` 和 `slug` 中設定的標頭執行任何驗證。No validation is performed on the headers that are set in `contentType` and `slug`. 因此，請不要使用變更要求意義的方式變更這些 HTTP 標頭。Therefore, do not change these HTTP headers in a way that changes the meaning of the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會傳遞至屬性的基礎物件。This value is passed to the property of the underlying object. 在對目標資料服務執行任何查詢或更新作業之前必須先設定這個值，因為會影響到要求。The value must be set before executing any query or update operations against the target data service can affect the request. 這個值在對資料服務的要求之間可能會發生變更，而新值將會由下一個資料服務要求所挑選。The value may be changed between requests to a data service and the new value will be picked up by the next data service request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可控制傳送至資料服務的建立、更新和刪除要求是否要使用通訊協定 (Protocol) 的 Post 通道功能。This property controls whether create, update, and delete requests sent to the data service will use the post tunneling feature of the protocol or not. 當設為 true 時會使用通道。When set to true, tunneling is used. 當設為 false 時會使用標準 HTTP 方法。When set to false, standard HTTP methods are used. 此屬性的預設值為 false。The default value of this property is false.
